tosdr.case: The service can suspend your account for several reasons

title: The service can suspend your account for several reasons
quoteText:
If Customer does not remedy its non-compliance within five (5) business days, Bitly reserves the right to suspend or terminate Customer’s use of the Bitly Services.
Bitly reserves the right to suspend Customer’s use of the Bitly Services without notice in the event that it believes, in good faith, the security of Customer’s Bitly account has been compromised, or the Customer’s Bitly account is being used for an unlawful purpose.
And may suspend or terminate Customer’s access to the Services without notice for violation of the Agreement.
